page.title: 13Developments in the area
page.content: The face of the village of{Binstead has changed over the past decade. There has been building over a large scale and the fields which stretched out as far as{Dame Anthony's Common are fields no more but a large housing estate. Many local residents in the village are upset by the disappearance of 'their' fields where they took walks. {Havenstreet,}on the other hand, has no large estates and the new properties are built in between the older houses in the village. it still remains a quiet, country village. The children of{Binstead School}have helped to{name some of the roads}on the new estate in Binstead- Hillrise Avenue, Chestnut Close, Cleaver Close. Gordon Close a small collection of new houses behind the old school was named after the chairman of the Governors.
